00022 #define SQR(x) ((x)*(x))

00025 static void ob_hosci(double* omega,
00026                      const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00027                      const GaussianAux* X, complex double* hosci)
00028 {
00029   double om = *omega;
00030 
00031   *hosci += (0.5/mass(G1->xi)* (3*X->lambda + X->pi2) +
00032              0.5*mass(G1->xi)* SQR(om)* (3*X->alpha + X->rho2))* X->Q;
00033 }

00036 void calcHOsciHF(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, double omega,
00037                  void* mes)
00038 {
00039   OneBodyOperator op_ob_hosci = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: &omega, me: ob_hosci};
00040 
00041   calcSlaterDetOBHFMEs(Q, X, &op_ob_hosci, mes);
00042 }
